jobs.jobDescription: SMTS/Principal ASIC Design Engineer - PCI Design and Integration
jobs.education: Graduate Degree in Electrical/Electronics Engg. (post Graduate is a plus)
jobs.keySkills: verilog, rtl coding, asic design, static timing analysis, digital design...
jobs.skills: - 8-20 years of ASIC RTL Design experience and Verilog/System Verilog proficiency- Experience with multiple clock and power domains- Extensive experience in integration and validation of high speed PCIe IP core- Experience with PCIe protocol analyzers and debug- Familiarity with PCIe driver and application software for Linux/Windows
jobs.functionalArea: IT Software - Embedded , EDA , VLSI , ASIC , Chip Design
jobs.companyProfile: Its a leading developer, and global supplier of high-speed connectivity solutions for data centers, enterprise and WLAN applications. The transition to 10 Gb Ethernet and Multi - Gig Ethernet is currently underway,driven by the consolidation of data in the cloud and the mobile revolution.Its 10 GBASE - T and AQrate PHY product lines lead the market with low - power,high - performance,and high - density silicon solutions
